document_data.name: Catnip
document_data.poisonousto: [[werepanther]]{{Cite web/The Search for the Circle of Vehlarr/Part Three}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Catnip''' was a type of [[herb]] that could be found on [[Toril]].
document_data.Availability:
Places in the Realms where catnip was known to be cultivated included:
* [[Cormanthor]]
* The [[Old Empires]]
* In the land of [[Zakhara]], catnip could be found being sold and even exported from the [[Pearl Cities]].
document_data.Usages:
* Among the Old Empires, it was sometimes used as a [[material component]] for the [[spell]] ''[[animal vision]]''.
* Catnip was one of three herbs that needed to be burned in a [[brazier]] for the spell ''[[find familiar]]''.<ref>
* Catnip could be used to treat [[common cold|colds]], fevers, hysteria, and spasms.
